name: Retail Banking
description: Provides financial services to individual consumers, including savings and checking accounts, personal loans, mortgages, and credit cards.

name: Corporate Banking
description: Offers financial solutions to businesses, including loans, credit, treasury services, and commercial real estate financing.

name: Investment Banking
description: Facilitates capital raising, mergers and acquisitions, and provides advisory services to corporations and governments.

name: Wealth Management
description: Delivers personalized financial planning, investment management, and advisory services to high-net-worth individuals and families.

name: Asset Management
description: Manages investment funds and portfolios on behalf of institutional and retail clients, aiming to achieve specific financial goals.

name: Insurance Services
description: Provides risk management solutions through various insurance products, including life, health, property, and casualty insurance.

name: Private Banking
description: Caters to affluent individuals with tailored financial services, including investment advice, estate planning, and tax optimization.

name: Payment Services
description: Facilitates electronic transactions through credit cards, debit cards, mobile payments, and online payment gateways.

name: Fintech
description: Innovates financial services through technology, offering digital banking, peer-to-peer lending, robo-advisors, and blockchain solutions.

name: Regulatory and Compliance Services
description: Ensures adherence to financial regulations and standards, providing audit, risk management, and compliance solutions.

name: Capital Markets
description: Facilitates the trading of financial securities, including stocks, bonds, and derivatives, providing liquidity and investment opportunities.
